topic.title: Default path in users directory
topic.body:
In file src/Config.py line 50

```Python
start_dir = os.path.expanduser("~/Library/Application Support/ZeroNet").decode(sys.getfilesystemencoding())
```

Directories in home dir users is match with created user. This is be to ~/.library or other [dot]DIRNAME. Linux system auto hide directory beginning dot.
